name: SafeSpace (NoDevHere)
description:
Controls

Movement - WASD

Interact/Pickup - E

Direction to your home - SHIFT

Quiting the game - ESC

The game has three basic mechanics.

Stock up on carrots. Make "friends". Evade enemies.

This is my first game-jam submission ever.  And I greatly underestimated the time I needed to make what I had in mind at the beginning. So for example the game doesn't save your progress. And there is only one single soundfile used in the entire game. But I hope you will still have as much fun with game as I had making it. :)
